cause.description:
People for the Recognition of American Educators
1. Educators are a pivotal part of modern society. They facilitate our learning the skills that will allow us to thrive in today's world, allowing our society to progress continually.
2. Educators have one of the most difficult jobs there is: getting people to understand many things about one field. They have to put up with the raging hormones of teenagers and young adults, along with their own problems, one of which being a low salary.
cause.mission: give educators the credit they deserve.
cause.name: PRAE
